pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Deals a large amount of her total damage while performing her Charged Spinning EX attack which applies devastating amounts of Assault but also allows Piper to move while casting.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can quickly apply the Flinched state to enemies thanks to her fast Physical Anomaly buildup increasing Daze the afflicted target takes by 10%.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"After performing a fully channeled EX spin and accumulating 20 stacks of her Power buff, grants the entire squad an 18% Damage % buff boosting her own and other character's output.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Spin to Win!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Has incredibly limited potential teammates she shares a Faction or Elemental synergy with outside of other Physical DPS who she’ll need to compete with on-field time for on. Lucy is her only non-DPS who doesn’t take up said field time and is also her faction companion.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Competes with many other A-Rank Physical DPS.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

talents.name: Leisure Moment
talents.desc: When Piper's Special Attack: Tire Spin, EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, or Ultimate hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of Power. The maximum stack limit of Power is increased to 30.

talents.name: Motivation
talents.desc: During Special Attack: Tire Spin and EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, Piper's movement speed increases. When using Special Attack: One Trillion Tons, EX Special Attack: Really Heavy, or Ultimate to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the Physical DMG dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For each stack of Power, this buff is further increased by 1%.

talents.name: Truck Expert
talents.desc: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

talents.name: Refined Techniques
talents.desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 30s.

talents.name: Personal Hobbies
talents.desc: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

talents.name: Mild Excitement
talents.desc: Increases the duration limit of EX Special Attack: Engine Spin by 2s and extends the duration of Power by 4s.

introduction.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Hmph, what in the world is so appealing about lottery tickets anyway? Victory and defeat are completely out of your own control!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
